channel.title: 4Watt Electro & Dubstep Podcasts
channel.description: 4Watt is a podcaster and wannabe electronic producer. This podcast is to highlight and promote electro, dirty, trashy, fidgety, breakbeat, leftfield, etc., house. If you want send or submit tracks please email me at 4wattpod[at]gmail[dot]com. Thanks...
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mix'n'mash for headphones or speakers

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 93 - Funky Fidget Step'n'Bass mix

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 74 - Electro Bassline mix'n'mash
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 57 - Funky Leftfield Electro House 16

item.title: 4Watt Pod 41 presents 5KULL-5TROBE guest electro mix

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 20 - Funky Leftfield Electro House mix 4
item.description: Something old (a-ha, Steve Hurley, Inner City), something new (Hot Chip in 2 flavours & Wham vs Kissy Sell Out - absolute genius...), something borrowed (all of it!), and something blue is where that kind of falls apart as an intro. Just listen and shuffle round in your seat a bit... Tracklisting 01 Please (Boss Boss Remix) - Paul Hartnoll feat. Robert Smith 02 Ready for the Floor (Soulwax Dub) - Hot Chip 03 Big Fun (Simian Mobile Disco Remix) - Kevin Saunderson feat. Inner City 04 Ready for the Floor (Jesse Rose Remix) - Hot Chip 05 Day Too Soon (Tom Neville Remix) - Sia 06 Get Busy Tropicana (The Wham Remix) - Kissy Sell Out 07 Defected (Olivier Giacomotto Remix ) - Robot Needs Oil 08 The Sun Always Shines On TV - a-ha 09 Work (Steve Pitron & Max Sanna Extended Remix version) - Kelly Rowland 10 Submarine - Axwell 11 Southern Comfort - Burial 12 Now You're Gone (Fonzerelli Remix) - Basshunter 13 Twilight - Adam K & Soha 14 Jack Your Body 2000 (Stacy's Swing Yo' Body mix) - Steve 'Silk' Hurley Podcasts - http://4wattpod.podomatic.com/ MySpace - http://www.myspace.com/4watt Enjoy! - 4Watt

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 18 - Drum'n'Bass mix
item.description: A step away form the usual 125-130bpm to the uptempo world of Drum'n'Bass. Take a listen to the incredible sounds of Pendulum, High Contrast, Nu:Tone and London Elektricity and some great remixes. Genius... item.itunes:summary:

Tracklisting: 01 Kiss Kiss Bang Bang - High Contrast 02 System (feat Natalie Williams)(Matrix & Futurebound Remix) - Nu:Tone 03 Another Planet - Pendulum 04 If We Ever - High Contrast 05 Girl In The Fire - Pendulum 06 Above And Beyond - PHD & The Funky Technicians 07 Careless Memories - Duran Duran 08 Sounds of Life - Pendulum feat Jasmine Yee 09 Slam - Pendulum 10 Different Drum (Photek remix) - London Elektricity 11 I Don't Understand (Craggz & Parallel Forces Remix) - London Elektricity 12 Plasticworld - Pendulum feat. fats & TC 13 Superstructure (John B Remix) - London Elektricity 14 Hold Your Colour - Pendulum 15 Out of This World (Dkay Remix) - London Elektricity 16 Fast Soul Music (Nu:Tone Remix) - London Elektricity 17 Chasing Pavements - Adele
Podcasts - http://4wattpod.podomatic.com/ MySpace - http://www.myspace.com/4watt
Enjoy! - 4Watt

item.title: 4Watt DJ Mix 17 - Funky Electro House Dance mashup mix
item.description: Some great mixes and production from Seiji in here. Great remix of Robot Needs Oil - class track & mix. A few oldies sneak in from Depeche Mode and ELO, along with a heads up from Lupe Fiasco and Britney.
